column1: floated full and outside off, Imam leans into this half-volley and drives straight to extra cover. Should've put that away
Chatara drags his length back and gets it to slant away outside off, teasing the outside edge. Imam is beaten emphatically
pitched up, nipping away to beat the bat and hit the back thigh
nice and full on off stump, Imam presses forward and drives straight to mid-off
good length and angling across off stump, Imam lets it go to debutant Murray behind the stumps
picked away off the hips to deep square leg for a couple of runs
sprays one on the hips, tucked away quietly off the back foot for one
full and angling across off, Imam chases a drive and misses
full and straight, tapped to the right of short midwicket off the front foot
glanced off the hips to short midwicket
short at the body, fended back to Muzarabani
back of a length and curving away past the outside edge again as Imam wafts in the corridor and does not make contact
short and just a shade outside off, enough space for Zaman to flash a cut down to deep third man
clipped away off the hips to Muzarabani at deep fine leg
nice and full on middle, blocked back to Chatara off the front foot

Chatara belts out an appeal for lbw, umpire Gould shakes his head. Good length, swings back in, has the batsman falling over the flick who was perhaps expecting the away-going delivery. Pitches in line but height may have been a concern here
overpitched and angling across off, Imam leans into it and crashes it through extra cover for the first boundary of the day. That should get the opener going
dug in short, attacks the body and cramps Imam for room. He hops, skips, and fends it off to short midwicket
full and floated into the pads, neatly glanced to deep fine leg
back of a length on leg stump, picked off again for a single
good length and slanting away outside off, no shot from Zaman
pitches outside leg stump, swings in the air, Zaman has a bigger swing at it and misses
full on middle stump, tipped to point off the face
wide half-volley, Zaman loves it there, he extends his arms and disdainfully slashes it through the covers. Boom
full inswinger, but too straight, clipped away through the leg side
back of a length and outside off, hit to backward point
Imam jumps across off and fends a short one to short midwicket
Imam camps back to this short ball on a fourth-stump line and punches to short cover
picked off the hips to Muzarabani to long leg for a single
back of a length and cuts back into Zaman to cramp him for room. Blocked back
back of a length and angling across off, defended to leg
kicks up from a good length outside off and nips away past the outside edge
Muzarabani finds extra bounce and angles across one past the outside edge. Imam is caught on the crease again
there's a deflection, but it's off the trouser on its way to Murray. The keeper has to wait for his first dismissal. Perfectly pitched delivery, slanting away late, squares up Imam but beats the bat
full and outside off, left alone
full on middle, played back, as Muzarabani rounds out a maiden
back of a length on off, stays low, stabbed into the covers off the back foot
on a length and outside off, stabbed away, again, this time straight to wide mid-off
Chatara shortens his length and gets it to angle across off, defended into the covers
punched into cover as Zaman is cramped for room by this incutter
scooped off a leading edge in front of short midwicket

First runs after 13 balls, and nearly a run-out. Zaman gets on top of a short ball outside off, flays to right of cover point, chances a quick single. There's a mix-up between the wickets and a poor throw gives them enough time to recover
back of a length and angling across off, Zaman flashes and misses
full on middle, punched to mid-on off the front foot
good length on middle, defended to short midwicket
dragged short and outside off, Zaman picks up the length super early. Swivels back and crunches a pull wide of short midwicket. That's like Shastri's tracer bullet
back of a length and swings back in after pitching, Zaman has a bigger swing and is beaten on the inside edge
short and just a shade outside off, Zaman splices it to cover point
back of a length on the hips, Imam hops and works it away to short midwicket
good length and angling away wide of off, ignored in the corridor
back of a length and angling across off, punched behind point to square-ish third man
back of a length and slanting away outside off, punched on the up to short cover
Zaman threads the gap now. Back of a length and angling away outside off, punched on the up between backward point and cover point. There's no stopping that
full around off, pressed to short cover off the front foot
fuller than a good length and nipping away outside off, squares up the batsman and finds the outside edge but it dies in front of second slip tumbling forward
hang up the caution, Imam. Here he comes down the track, meets a short ball outside off and pummels it up and over extra cover
short of a length and angling across off, Imam gets up on his tippy toes and punches to short cover
good length on middle, played back
shortish and slanting away outside off, Imam lets it go

back of a length and angling across off, stabbed away in the gap between backward point and cover point. Chibhabha chases the ball hard, slides at the edge of the boundary, hauls it in. Top work from Chibhabha
pulls but can't pierce the gap, straight to midwicket
short and angling away, steered straight to point
goes back and across as he bunts this length delivery to point
fails to control this pull, the ball hurried onto him. Squirted to the left of mid-on
pulled away, down to deep square. Once again not in control
slower and fuller on leg stump, tucks this wide of midwicket for a quick single
hustled for pace, the ball deflects off the thigh pad to the leg side as he looks to whip it square
once again extra bounce, thuds into the pad and deflects to the leg side as they scamper a legbye
pulled away, this was timed magnificently. Too short, picked the length, swiveled and walloped it behind square
hops back and punches to cover
dabs this gently to point again
short delivery angling away, Imam sways out of the way
back of length that curves back in a little on middle, defended back
slashed up and over to third man
floats it full and across Imam, who lunges forward and blocks
pulled away down to the man at deep midwicket
punches this slightly fuller delivery to point, tight bowling.
slashed down to square third man again
nearly chopped on! Looked to ease this into the off side, no room. The length did him in, much fuller than he expected
mistimes a short-arm jab to deep midwicket
slants a full delivery on off, defended to the bowler off a thick inside edge. Looks for a single, non-striker responds but is sent back
works this off  length on middle to mid-on
defends this full delivery from the crease, tight bowling.
gentle little dab to backward point
works this off an inside edge past midwicket for a quick single
slaps this away-going length delivery to sweeper cover
angles this length ball down to third man
pulled away, once again not in control, down to deep midwicket
fetches the pull from outside off towards deep midwicket
spanks this behind point. Just a hint of width, this time he had enough room to power that away
works this length ball wide of mid-on
once again no timing as he manages to play this wide of cover. Looked for a lofted drive over the infield
full and angling away, squeezes the drive to point
skiddy delivery on middle and leg, pulled to deep square leg
turns this full delivery on middle and leg to deep square
straying into the pads, he manages to tickle this nicely to the fine leg boundary. Easy pickings, one that will also relieve a lot of pressure
punches this length delivery from around the stumps to deep point
nice flight, lands this on off, Imam lunges forward and smothers this
punches this down to deep cover for an easy single
nice and full on off, eased back to the bowler
too short and punished. Fakhar uses the depth of the crease and the pace to steer this wide of short third man
steps out and eases this with the spin to long-off
works this full delivery on the pads to midwicket
punches this length delivery to extra cover
squeezes this yorker-length to midwicket. Tailed in late from middle, caught Imam by surprise.
cuts but straight to point. Hit it hard into the ground, not much power.
crunching drive to sweeper cover
sways out of the way of this short ball
goes back and across as he works this off a length to deep square
eases this from the crease to deep point, lazy work there. Comfortably back for the second
whips this down to long-on, touch short this time
nice flight, he skips out and bunts this into the covers for a quick single
looks to cut but this drifts in from wide of the crease, whipped to midwicket where there's a misfield by Tiripano
worked into the gap at midwicket for an easy single
on the pads, tucked to fine leg
length ball angling away, punched into the gap at sweeper cover. Good work by Muzarabani, who puts in the dive to save a run. Went around towards deep point when he put in the dive.
eased down to square third man
punches this length delivery straight to point
works this gently into the leg side for an easy single
on the pads, he works this down to fine leg where there's a misfield that allows the second
tossed on off, blocked off the front foot
tossed up slower and higher outside off, down the track and hoisted up and over extra cover. Lovely swing of the arms, Fakhar
skids on outside off, short, slashed to point
on a length and holds its line outside off, tipped to cover
back of a length and angling into middle and leg, forced off the back foot to long-on. Fakhar brings up another fifty
pushed through outside off, driven through the line to long-off
full and outside off, worked to midwicket
back of a length and outside off, punched to long-off
tip and run to cover point for one
glanced off the pads in front of square, and that brings up the century stand
short on the stumps, back-foot force to long-on
tapped down the ground for one more
slower offbreak outside off, leans back and guides to backward point
faster and flatter outside off, stabbed to backward point
punched through the line to sweeper cover
pushed through outside off, hit to short cover
slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
short and outside off, cut to backward point
Zaman backs away outside leg and muscles one to the covers
back of a length on leg stump, forced to midwicket off the back foot
forced back to the bowler now
good length and sliding away outside off, Zaman opens the late so very late and delightfully dabs it fine of short third man for four
clipped off the pads to fine leg this time
nudged off the pads to midwicket. Imam brings up a fifty of his own and gets a hug from Zaman
tossed outside off, down the track and pushed down to long-off

Maiden international wicket for Roche. He hangs onto a return catch. Zaman hares down the track, Roche spots it and fires it shorter and wider outside off. Stabbed back to the bowler. He sticks out both his hands to his right and snaffles it. Zimbabwe break the century opening stand
turning into the pads, clipped to deep square
Imam comes down the pitch and secures a single to long-off
floated up on off, forward and smothered
short and spinning into a punch to short cover
worked through square leg
dangled up on off, forward-defensive
short and turns away outside off, lashed away to the covers
uses his feet and jabs it away past the left of Wellington
punched with the turn to sweeper cover off the back foot
Imam skips out, Wellington drags his length back outside off, forced to Wellington
short and spins in from outside off, carved away to short third man, where Chatara half-stops the ball to his left
laced off the back foot to long-on
nurdled off pads to short fine leg
good length and spins in at off stump, hangs back and secures a single down to long-on does Babar
straighter one on off, pushed back to Roche
long-hop on middle stump, Imam skips back and pummels a pull over midwicket. The ball flies to the boundary
full on off, eased to cover
short and outside off, hacked away to long-on
tucked off the pads to deep square
drifts in on middle, inside-edged to the leg side
chopped from off stump to short third man
back of a length on the hips, turned away to deep midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off, Babar jumps on the back foot and thumps it away to the left of short cover
short, wide, four again. Babar goes on the back foot again, cracking a cut in the gap at the covers. Tripe bowling from Roche
skips out and punches a single down to long-on now
looped up on off, Imam charges down the track, gets underneath the length and lofts it beautifully over the bowler's head
more tripe from Roche. Rank long-hop outside off, Imam skips back and clubs a pull over midwicket. Bam
short, wide, laced to deep backward point. 19 off the over
nudged to square leg for one
tucked off the pads to deep square leg
short on middle, swatted away to midwicket
short, wide, chopped to off-side sweeper
uses his feet and forces the ball to the left of short midwicket
Imam shuffles across off, gets inside the line of this full ball and clips it away in the direction of deep midwicket
back of a length and slanting away outside off, steered to third man
pitched up on a fourth-stump line, Babar rocks back and firmly drives it back to the bowler
very full and angling into the pads from wide of the crease, chipped in the air... but does not carry to mid-on
full on the stumps, Babar leans into it and delightfully drives it straight of mid-on for four
Babar leans back and meets this short ball outside off. Dabbed down to deep third man
short and angling away outside off, dragged against the angle to deep midwicket. They chance a second and take it without much fuss
eased with the spin to long-off
touch short, whipped to deep square
drifts in and straightens, defended gently.
steps out and drives this low full toss to long-off
tucks this to midwicket, wanted to work it to his left but will get the run anyway
eases this square drive to sweeper cover as he jogs the single
defends this full delivery towards the man coming in from point, swift work. Single prevented
works this incoming delivery on middle and leg to deep square
dropped by the keeper! Tough chance diving to his left. Murray could rue that. Healthy edge as Imam prods forward, this full delivery left him late to take the edge. Oh, dear.
slanting down leg, tickled to fine leg
pulls this down to fine leg for a single
defends this incoming length delivery to the leg side.
works this off his pads to deep midwicket
eased back to the bowler
pulled straight to midwicket. This was a long hop and Babar is disgusted at the stoke he's just played. Wanted to go over midwicket but couldn't get the elevation.
full on off, dabbed to cover
guided through the covers
down the track and drilled down to long-on
floated full on middle, Imam welcomes him into the attack with a loft over mid-off inside the circle
back of a length on the stumps, hit back to the bowler
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat
Imam rides the bounce of this short ball outside off from round the wicket and helps it to third man
worked off the pads to short midwicket
punched up to backward point off the back foot
tossed on leg stump, paddled away fine of long leg
full and straight, clipped to deep midwicket
shortish and outside off, steered to backward point
sliding across off, dabbed fine of short third man
full on the stumps, clipped to deep midwicket off the front foot
dangled up outside off, nudged to the covers off the front foot
shortish and angling away outside off, glided to third man
full and outside off, driven through the covers with an open face
Malik gets inside the line of a short ball on middle and pulls to fine leg
glanced off the pads in front of square
chopped from off stump to third man
chest-high short ball on middle, Imam shuffles across off, gets on top of it and powers a pull behind square to raise his second ODI hundred in his fifth match
on a length and holds its line just a shade outside off, bunted to short cover
tossed outside off, Malik dances down the track and tonks a six over wide long-on. Huuuuuuuge six
whisked to short midwicket with the incoming angle
guided to the left of short cover off the front foot
shuffles across and whips one behind square on the leg side
Malik goes back to punch this short ball from outside off to long-off
chipped away to deep square for a couple of runs
pitched up and outside off, driven through the covers
clipped off the hips to deep square
back of a length on the stumps, punched down to long-on
back of a length and outside off, Imam ventures down the track and muscles it over midwicket
worked from outside off through square leg
leg-side wide
backs away and drills it inside-out to wide long-off
skips out and forces to short midwicket
back of a length on middle, stabbed back
shuffles across and works one behind square
chopped from off stump to point
down the track and cracked to deep midwicket
steers this down to third man
steps out to drive, beaten. Backed away too far, couldn't reach in the end
slower and fuller on the pads, worked to wide long-on
steps out to go over the top, beaten as he can't get to the pitch.
slower on middle and leg, whips this down to the man coming in from long-on
plays the short-arm jab nicely to deep square leg
crunching drive to sweeper cover
fine leg up inside the ring, he tickles it nicely to beat the man. Too easy
works this off a length on middle and leg to midwicket
looks to give himself some room to cut, only manages a thick edge through to the keeper. Credit to Tiripano as he saw the batsman backing away and bowled it wide. Timely wicket
gets off the mark with a thick outside edge to the third man boundary, not where he intended but will take the runs
works this off his hip to deep square leg
back of length outside off, steered down to square third man
drilled down the ground to long-on
punches this length ball on middle and leg to deep midwicket
makes room and steers this back of length delivery towards third man, aggressive running from Asif Ali
right on top of the bounce as he steers it down to third man
steps out and squeezes this drive to third man, looked to go over point
looks to pull but this is way down leg, lucky to get away with that. Should have been called wide.
steps out and slices this attempted lofted hit to square third man
belts this on the bounce to Masakadza at mid-off, a direct hit at the bowler's end and Imam would've been gone
slower and fuller on middle, he holds his shape nicely and muscles this over long-on. Timed superbly
slash and a miss. Too close to the body
eased wide of point for a single, nine off the over.
full on middle and leg, flicked into the gap towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
whips this full delivery on middle and leg to deep midwicket
this has been hammered, deep into the stands at wide long-on. Length ball angling in, he stood his ground and teed off like a golfer. This is raw power, can't bowl length at this stage.
belts this full delivery down to long-on
slower and fuller outside leg, Imam steps out to flick but was cramped for room. Just brushed his back shoe on the way to the keeper.
walks across to flick, but this is a yorker-length delivery, squeezed to the leg side for a single

bowls the hard length and gets rewarded, an attempted muscle over long-on has found the fielder. Imam didn't get any power behind that, dragged it from outside off. All said and done, this is an excellent catch by Musakanda. The last parts of his innings after the century was a royal struggle, but take no credit away from him.
swing and a miss.
gets big on him, so he goes through with the pull, well stopped by the fine leg fielder running around
width and he's hammered that over point, one bounce to the fence. Top shot
delightful square drive, this is too full, right into the hitting arc. He could have belted this, but chooses to simply caress this through the off side.
belts this on the bounce to long-off
fetches the pull from outside off, lands short of the man coming in from deep midwicket
slips in a yorker down leg, not given a wide again. Another poor call
finds the fence again, super placement. Once again too short, he picked the length early and walloped this to the square leg fence
gets more elevation than distance, no more than a mishit. Wellington Masakadza had all the time in the world to run in from long-on but something stopped him from going for the catch
looks to pull, bails out in the end, on the bounce to the keeper.
high full toss, looks to pull but this brushes the thigh pad on the way to the keeper.

this is a magnificent catch at deep midwicket. Pulled with some ferocity, the man there had no more than a split second to decide if he was going for it. Chari took off, moved swiftly to his left and then put out a full length dive to his left to take that stunner.
carved away towards sweeper cover, good work by Chari
gets on top of the bounce and taps this behind point
slices this so high that two fielders - keeper and square third man - ran across trying to catch but this fell in no man's land.
back of length outside off, far too wide, left alone. Given wide
right in the slot, he swings cleanly but has found the long-off fielder. Tiripano with a superb catch moving low and full stretch forward. Excellent knock nonetheless from Asif Ali.
edged but falls short of the keeper. Fairplay to the keeper, who knew immediately that this bounced in front.
slower and fuller on middle and leg, tucked towards the man coming in from deep midwicket. They scamper back for the second
works this gently into the leg side
looks to muscle one over the leg side fence, but was looking to the long boundary, didn't get any power on the pull and deep midwicket takes an excellent catch.
wrong line on the pads, tickled away fine to beat fine leg. Too easy. Can't ask for a better first ball
helps this to short third man
punches this length ball to the edge of the ring at cover.
off the pad to the off side, they scamper a single. Looked to walk across and flick behind square
slower and fuller outside off, squeezed towards deep point, a misfield allows the second
another fluent square drive to deep point
slapped back to the bowler, who deflects it towards cover.
right into the blockhole, squeezed back to the bowler
another excellent yorker, angled towards the man coming in from third man. Excellent running.
back of a length and darted at the hips, glanced away from the crease to fine leg
on the hips again, tucked away squarer for one
back of a length and skipping away outside off, the batsman jabs away from the body and watches the ball move past the outside edge
overpitched and outside off, belted into the covers, where there's a fumble
good length and angling across off, left alone
Chibhabha drives away from the body and inside-edges the ball onto his foot

and he strikes with his first ball, having Chari miscue a pull to short midwicket. Short, skids off the pitch, targeting the ribs. The batsman is rushed into a pull and he ends up splicing a catch to Zaman
full at off, defended to cover
pitches outside leg and swings to catch the pad as Hamilton plays down the wrong line
short and speared just outside leg, Hamilton has a waft at it, off the trouser? and to the left of the keeper
very full and angling away wide outside off, ignored
overpitched and outside off, leans into it and caresses the ball through the covers
pitches on leg stump and nips away to strike the back thigh
back of a length and angling across off, spliced to cover
on a length and angling across off, run away to point
blocked on off stump as this full ball holds its line
short, wide, Hamilton simply throws his bat at ball and slashes to deep third man's right for four
back-of-a-length inswinger, Hamilton plays all around it and weathers the lbw shout as the height is the issue here
chipped to mid-off off a leading edge
short and outside off, fended back
back of a length and angling across off, Hamilton gets behind the line in defence and plays it to cover
full and slanted across off, left alone
full and drifting into the pads, Hamilton aims a flick but it's a weak shot and he spoons a catch to Zaman diving forward at short midwicket. Two wickets in two overs for Usman
back of a length and outside off, guided square through off side
on a length and angling away outside off, swiped against the angle, up and over wide mid-on
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to mid-on
short and wide outside off, bounces over the top edge
short and outside off, helped to third man
back of a length and outside off, slashed to deep third man
Amir thinks he has his man caught behind but the on-field umpire shakes his head. This was mighty full and hurled across off stump, Musakanda jabs at it but the ball has missed the edge
full inswinger, pitches outside leg and raps the pad. Umpire Gould shoots down the appeal
stabbed back to the bowler
another full inswinger, hits the pad again, but pitched outside leg again
full and outside off, driven through the line to Malik at mid-off
Usman squares up the batsman with a short outswinger, defended to the off side
rides the bounce of this short ball on off and fences it to point
short and angling across off, steered to third man
full, outside off, punchily driven to mid-off
too full and outside off, Chibhabha punishes Amir with a strong front-foot cover drive
left alone outside off
extra bounce from a length, fended to deep third man
driven on the up to the right of mid-off
full and shoots low on off, dug out
poked between covers and point for one
back of a length and outside off, hangs back and punches to cover
sprayed on the pads, tickled away fine of short fine leg for four
full and angling across off, scoops a drive to mid-off
uses the angle and steers to backward point
full and outside off, dabbed to deep third man
full and swings back in, an inside edge saves Chibhabha
back of a length and angling into a front-foot defence back to the bowler
full and outside off, pressed into the covers
shuffles across off and clips a single to midwicket
overpitched and outside off, drilled down the ground, Malik at mid-off throws himself to his right to stop the ball
nice and full outside off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
full awayswinger, too wide, off-side wide
overpitched on off, whipped away past the right of mid-on for four
lifter outside off, beats the hook
rides a short one to deep third man
short and outside off, glided to third man
pitched up and outside off, pumped over mid-on for four
short on off, fended back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, pushed to point
indipper, jabbed from off stump to cover
another indipper, inside-edged past leg stump, Sarfraz dives to his left to gather the ball
full and outside, driven to mid-off
Flapped straight into the lap of mid-on. Musakanda slumps to his knees. Faheem hits a hard length outside off, neither pullable nor cuttable. Musakanda splices a catch to Malik
full and outside off, carved over backward point
steered off the face to deep third man
back of a length and outside off, no shot
short on off, the batsman gets behind the line in defence
punched on the up to short cover's left
skidding into the pads, deflected behind square
on a length and outside off, left alone
back of a length, angling in from wide of the crease and straightening away past the outside edge
full and outside off, swished to sweeper cover
on a length and outside off, push-driven to sweeper cover off the front foot
nice and full on off, Moor is rock solid in defence
good length and angling into a punch to mid-on
bouncer on leg stump, ducks under it
rides the bounce of this short ball and drops it to cover
Hasan Ali storms through the gate of Chibhabha. This a cracker of a delivery from Hasan. Fuller than a good length and zips back in to beat the defences and send the leg stump cartwheeling
good length and angling in, defended back on off stump
fullish and outside off, opens the face and drives it to sweeper cover
short and outside off, punched up to sweeper cover
edged and taken at first slip. In-between length, angling in, and straightening away late. Moor has a loose prod and snicks it behind to Babar. Zimbabwe continue to crumble in Bulawayo
back of a length and outside off, dinked to point
chopped to third man
full and outside off, no shot
hits the pad, but this inswinger is going down leg
full on off, defended back
bouncer outside off, ducks under it
punched to backward point off the back foot
full and angling into a front-foot defence to cover
yorker on off, dug out
length outside off, eased to deep point
right on top of the bounce as he steers this down to third man.
overthrow from deep midwicket, they take two when it should've just been a single. Coming back to the shot, this was a mistimed pull from outside off
another excellent short ball, Murray sways out of the way nicely
gets half a stride in and defends this length ball angling i
width outside off, cut away to the point fielder.
back of length delivery outside off, he shoulders arms
looks to flay this behind point but is beaten
touch fuller and just outside off, left alone
keeps low as this length ball angles in from wide of the crease, defended back
length ball that nips back in off the seam, he defends to get a thick inside edge towards square leg
bunts this length delivery on off to extra cover.
hint of flight, lands this on off, he lunges forward and defends.
full and flat on off, he gets a good stride in and blocks
defends this length ball back to the bowler.
eases the drive past short cover for an easy single
slides in and keeps a touch low, Tiripano is right back in the crease as he defends. Lucky to get some bat on it
drifts in a tossed up delivery, he gets forward and blocks.
flatter one on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
drifting into the pads, tickled to fine leg
works this full delivery to short midwicket
spins back into middle and leg, turned to the man coming in from short fine, bit of a mix-up but they complete a quick single
fired full and flat on the stumps, defended back
punches this length ball to mid-on, just two off the over.
driven through the line to long-off
full toss outside off, he frees his arms and belts this through the line. Deep cover had no chance. Buffet ball and he cashed in.
goes back and across as he punches this to cover
dropped at first slip , but this was a tough chance, made tougher by the fact that the keeper got some glove on it. Shaped to drive, beaten by sharp turn as this took the edge. Babar, I think it is
gets forward and defends
makes room and cuts to deep cover
tossed up on middle and leg, worked with the spin into the leg side
full on middle and leg, he goes back into the crease and stabs this away
whips this skiddy delivery past midwicket
gets a thick edge to short third man, shaped to go for a big booming drive.
drills this tossed up delivery down to long-on
on middle and leg, worked behind square to the fielder on the leg side
googly but he gets right to the pitch of the ball and eases this down to long-on
sharp turn but he gets close to the pitch of the ball and angles this behind square, to point
thick bottom edge past slip, races to the third man boundary. Shaped to cut, beaten by the skid nearly
drifts in a full delivery on middle, he gets well forward and blocks
steers this length ball from off to point
done in by the googly, jabbed at it from the crease, left a huge gap between bat and pad. The ball spun back in to crash into the middle stump.
skids one in at length on middle, turned to short midwicket
punched back to the bowler
eased back past the bowler to long-on for an easy single
works this between midwicket and square leg for a quick single
turns this indrifter on middle and leg to midwicket
defends this quicker delivery back
steers this length ball on off to sweeper cover
width outside off, he rocks back and cracks this to deep cover
looks to drill one back past the bowler, got a thick inside edge onto the boot, lobs to Shadab and he puts down a sitter
defends this quicker delivery gently, little late on the stroke but no damage done
quicker one at length on middle and leg, defended back down to the bowler.
cuts but can't pierce the gap, straight to point
fired full on the stumps, defended back
shows the full face as he punches this to mid-on
nice flight, he is enticed and goes for a big booming drive, only to get a thick edge past the vacant slip region
punched down to long-on
goes right back into the crease and punches this length ball to long-on
turns this gently wide of square leg for a quick single
drills this tossed up delivery to sweeper cover
right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this past cover for an easy single
drifts in and spins away to squirt past cover on the drive
as easy as catches come, looks to heave one over mid-on, but fails to make proper contact, dolly inside the ring. Roche's first innings for Zimbabwe has been a painful one.
drifts away a slider, which he defends and gets a thick inside edge onto the pad
defends this full delivery to midwicket
punches this shortish delivery to long-on for an easy single
nice flight, lands this in off, he lunges forward and defends.
right to the pitch of the ball as he dabs this tossed up delivery
squeezes this drive to short cover again
fired full and flat on the stumps, defended back.
goes back and across as he punches this indrifter to mid-on
eases the drive to cover

bowled through the gate! Plays all around a full delivery that drifts away late to beat the outside edge and crash into the stumps. Small gap between pad and pad, enough for the ball to sneak back in.
quicker one on middle and leg, blocked.
goes right back into the crease and punches this back to the bowler.
cut away, a misfield at point means they'll get two when there should have been none. Sarfraz is unhappy, yelps in frustration
driven uppishly, down to long-off
hint of width outside off, punched to sweeper cover
gets half a stride in forward as he blocks
angles a full delivery on off from wide of the crease, defended with soft hands
right behind the line as he defends this incoming length delivery
squeezes this drive to point
plays outside the line as this full delivery swerves back in to roll to the leg side off an inside edge
touch short outside off, he uses the width to steer this to deep point
fired full on off, he gets half forward and stabs this away
squeezes this drive down to long-off
full and fast on off, defended back
drives this low full toss to wide long-off for an easy single
fired full and fast, this one fizzes past the outside edge as he defends forward.
gets on top of the bounce and works this nicely past square leg, nice wrist work
looks to steer this down to third man but is beaten for pace
ducks under this short ball comfortably. Touch wayward from Amir
another short ball, this time outside off. He ducks under it without much fuss
fired full on middle from around the stumps, he shows the full face of the bat and defends back
looks to help this over slip, can't lay bat to it. Beaten for pace, again.
eases this drive with the spin to long-off
fired full and flat on off stump, kept out
drifts in a full delivery on middle, defended with soft hands
nice full stretch forward as he keeps out this tossed up delivery
uppish but safe, stretched forward and lofted this drive wide of Asif Ali at mid-off
rolls off a thick inside edge to the leg side, played outside the line in trying to defend that
the length ball nips back in from outside off to hit him high on the thigh pad
healthy edge as he pokes at a short of length ball that nips away, Sarfraz gleefully accepts.
bouncer, angling in at the head, Muzarabani ducks out of the way
full, angling in and seaming away last past the iffy prod
very full and wide outside off, left alone
off-stump yorker, jammed out to mid-off
on a length and turns away outside off, the batsman leans back and forces the ball to backward point
floated up outside off, driven with the break through the covers
follows two legbreaks with a slider outside off, left alone
here comes the wrong'un, turns in to take the inside edge and roll away to the leg side
tossed on off stump, glided away to point
shorter wrong'un, spins in from outside off, Muzarabani looks to cut and ends up chopping the ball back onto the stumps. Shadab claims his best figures in ODIs and wraps up Pakistan's win
